subject: Leukemia
Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: Indianapolis’s interim coach, Bruce Arians, has instructed the players to do their jobs and not to worry about winning for Chuck Pagano, who was recently diagnosed with leukemia.
snippet: Indianapolis’s interim coach, Bruce Arians, has instructed the players to do their jobs and not to worry about winning for Chuck Pagano, who was recently diagnosed with leukemia.
